content: Right ring finger trigger finger recurrence
title: Chief Complaint

content: The patient is here for follow-up. She reports doing very well from a thumb perspective and has adapted to her CMC arthritis. However, she notes that her right ring finger trigger finger has recurred. She began noticing symptoms around February 25, 2020. She initially thought it might not return, but it has. She is currently experiencing triggering in the right ring finger with mild tenderness to palpation of the right ring finger pulley.
title: HPI Spencer

content: On the exam , it'll be mild tender palpation of the thumb CMC joints . There is triggering at the right ring finger , there is tenderus palpation of the right ring for pulley plan .
title: Musculoskeletal

content: - Right ring finger trigger finger recurrence
title: Assessment

content: Recommend conservative management for right ring finger trigger finger.
title: Plan
